The AppMenu is an optional menu which is: El AppMenu es un menú opcional que se abre mediante el icono de la rueda dentada en el extremo derecho de la barra de herramientas de una aplicación. Este menú sustituye a la barra de menús tradicional y, por tanto, contiene las mismas órdenes.
You should first consider if your app ne: You should first consider if your app needs this widget. While most apps may have one, your app may not necessarily need an AppMenu.
When adding items to your AppMenu, consi: When adding items to your AppMenu, consider the following:
Items should be relevant and useful. It': Items should be relevant and useful. It's not acceptable to duplicate items that are found in your main UI here.
If the app includes a &quot;preferences&: If the app includes a "preferences" window, it should be available from the AppMenu.
There should be an item for the &quot;Ab: There should be an item for the "About" dialog which contains links to the project's bug tracker, help, etc.
If an AppMenu is displayed, a menu bar s: Si una aplicación utiliza un AppMenu, no debe haber una barra de menús; y viceversa.
